title: Ethan Elasky
text:
Hi, I’m Ethan! I’m a senior at the University of California, Berkeley, and a Data Science major.
I’m also a member of Angus Hildreth’s Social Psychology and Business Lab at the Haas School of Business.

title: Quarto Basics
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure 1.


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()





Figure 1: A line plot on a polar axis

title: Ethan Elasky
text:
I’m a senior studying Data Science at the University of California, Berkeley.
At the Haas School of Business, I’m a member of Angus Hildreth’s Social Psychology and Business Lab.
Having studied abroad in Taiwan during Spring 2023 and grown up in America, I understand English and Mandarin.
In high school, I was ranked top-50 in Lincoln-Douglas debate nationally.
